author: James Tanner
method: Heat the stock in a saucepan until simmering, then add the spring onions and continue to simmer for five minutes. Add the noodles and simmer for a further five minutes.   Add the salmon pieces and simmer for a further five minutes, or until the salmon is cooked through. To serve, pour the broth into a bowl and drizzle with the soy sauce and sesame oil.
ingredients: 250ml/10fl oz chicken stock,  2 spring onions, cut in half,  110g/4oz ready-made udon noodles,  110g/4oz salmon fillet, skin removed, chopped,  drizzle sesame oil, to serve,  drizzle soy sauce, to serve
